4c5a7070-adac-49d0-9e1e-ea618a7fc0cb:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"4c5a7070-adac-49d0-9e1e-ea618a7fc0cb","title":{"en":"My Childhood Friend Became an Obsessive Husband"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"소꿉친구가 집착 남편이 되었다"},{"ko-ro":"Sokkwupchinkwuga Cipchak Namphyeni Toyetta"},{"en":"From BFF to Obsessive Hubby"},{"en":"My Childhood Friend Became an Obsessive Male Lead"},{"en":"A Childhood Friend Became an Obsessive Husband"},{"th":"เพื่อนสมัยเด็กของฉันกลายเป็นสามีคลั่งรัก"},{"ja":"幼馴染はキケンな公爵様⁉"},{"zh":"所以和竹马紧急结婚了"},{"zh-hk":"兒時玩伴成了迷戀我的丈夫"},{"ko-ro":"Soggubchinguga Jibchag Nampyeon'i Doeeossda"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["pl","es-la"],"description":{"en":"Isabelle is an orphan living in a temple with lots of knowledge about the love between men and women thanks to red covered novels that the saints had sneaked in.\n\nBut then, she found out that a priest secretly sold her to be a one-night stand for the duke who kills his lovers due to the shame of his inability to perform…\n\nThere’s only one way to get out of this, and it is to be a married woman.\n\nAt that moment, Isabelle recalled her childhood friend, Riggs, who said he wasn’t interested in dating.\n\n“So, Riggs, marry me.”\n\n“…What?”\n\n“Nobles would refuse unless it’s a pure woman.”\n\n“…Why do you hate the Duke of Cardiago so much?”\n\n“Everything else is fine. Being a tyrant? If you’ve lived your life to the fullest, that could happen. But there can be no problems at night.”\n\nRiggs was so frustrated that it seemed like he was going crazy.\n\nA few days later, the reclusive Duke of Cardiago came to the temple.\n\nOf course, the most surprising thing to Isabelle was the true identity of her childhood friend.\n\n“Isabelle, you wanted to get married. You can’t say no because you proposed first. I’m the closest man to your ideal type anyway.”\n\n“My ideal type?”\n\n“Don’t I know your ideal type? You like guys who are tall, handsome, smell of soap at night, and sleep in simple clothes. Also, on the first night, the bed should break.”\n\n“…”\n\n“That’s everything, and I can do it all for you. So marry me.”\n\nShe once knew everything about her childhood friend, but that changed the moment they got married.\n\n“Riggs, slow down…”\n\n“I think I’m slow enough.”\n\n“You weren’t always this impatient.”\n\nIsabelle said pleadingly, but Riggs replied with a smirk.\n\n“I was a childhood friend then, but now I’m your husband.”\n\n---\nIsabelle has always dreamed of meeting her true love and living happily ever after. Unfortunately, she discovers that she was just sold to the monstrous Duke Cardiego, who's infamous for killing his bride candidates. Her only way out is to quickly marry someone else, and as it turns out, her BFF, Lix, is the perfect choice! Although she tells him she will just stay a friend, Lix begins to show her that he doesn't feel the same way. Als sie eines Morgens, zwei Jahrzehnte vor Beginn ihrer arrangierten und unglücklichen Ehe mit dem Herzog Herr James Parnell, aufwacht und realisiert, dass sie in der Zeit zurückgereist ist, beschließt sie, ihr Leben radikal umzukremplen. Sie heckt einen Plan aus, um ihre Ehe zu annullieren und stattdessen den Herzog Ian Tyrone zu heiraten, der aufgrund seines bekannten Desinteresses an Frauen als *impotent* gilt. Vielleicht würde jenes Desinteresse an Frauen Olivia ein entspanntes Leben als Ehefrau ermöglichen, ohne den Druck, Kinder kriegen oder andere Dinge tun zu müssen. Zumindest erhofft sie sich das. 4c729f70-0147-4efa-a845-742f03752e69:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"4c729f70-0147-4efa-a845-742f03752e69","title":{"en":"Tokyo Death Game"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"東京遊戯"},{"ja-ro":"Tokyo Yugi Tokyo Death Game"},{"ja":"東京遊戯 Tokyo Death Game"},{"en":"Tokyo Death Game"}],"description":{"en":"16-year-old Kaname Amamiya is a kind, well-meaning young man with a lot of troubles. His parents have both died, leaving him to care for his 14-year-old sister, Miyu. But now Miyu is sick, and unless she gets very expensive surgery, she will die before she turns 20. On top of that, media outlets were recently hijacked by the video streamer Cypher, who declares that he’s bought Japan.\n\nCypher is a mysterious individual who looks like a skeleton face with a body. His says his plan is to isolate Tokyo and host “The Tokyo Game” there. He warns people it’s a difficult game, but says that if they win, he’ll grant one wish.\n\nThat’s all Kaname needs to know. With one wish, he could get his sister the medical help she needs.\n\nKaname signs himself up for the game and joins with crowds in Tokyo for it to begin. The first game just has the people reach some towers, which doesn’t sound difficult. But that’s before it’s revealed people are going to get killed during this game. Cypher has people watching the game on their screens, and it’s clear he wants baser instincts to come out for the sake of viewership.\n\nFrom here Kaname is thrown into a life or death struggle just to reach those towers, and worse things are probably around the corner. The manga is fast-paced, and after initially feeling sympathetic for Kaname’s scenario, it’s easy to get caught up in what he’s trying to do for his sister. The game he’s gotten himself into is sadistic and cruel, but Cypher has a point about what viewers like to watch, and the manga knows this and runs with it. In this way, it feels like a mirror to society, and it might have deeper meanings as the series progresses. Right now it’s full of thrilling action, and you can tell the action is only just getting started."},"links":{"al":"154433","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0BP6RXLHS","ap":"tokyo-death-game","bw":"series/333850/list","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/673967/","engtl":"https://www.mangamo.com/manga/tokyo-death-game","kt":"tokyo-death-game","mu":"193767","raw":"https://ganma.jp/tokyoyugi"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"cdad7e68-1419-41dd-bdce-27753074a640","name":{"en":"Horror"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}}]}

well.\"\n\"The specific meaning of the symbol varies by nation and religion, and also by the position of the \"arms\" of the cross--whether they face left or right, or whether the cross is tilted or straight.\"\n\"In the 1930s, the swastika symbol--a clockwise, tilted cross--was adopted by the Nazi Political Party in Germany, and gained a negative reputation as a symbol of hatred in the modern In order to do that, they must first find the links to a complex interlocking chain of riddles that has wrapped around their entire existence, and unravel the knots that tie them to a mystifying diary and a baffling string of strangers and semi-acquaintances who all have their own secrets, agendas and \"survival strategies.\" And in order for Himari to live, someone else's chosen destiny will have to change. So when shy and conservative Mochizuki becomes her newest client, his reserved behavior perplexes her. Every night she pulls out her best feminine wiles, so why isn't he falling for her already? But Balt isn't satisfied with just one night and moves Claire and her family to live at his palace so that she can \"service\" him whenever he pleases. However, Claire may end up paying Balt back more than he could've imagined... because Claire isn't quite the simple peasant girl she appears to be. As Balt becomes increasingly embroiled in the empire's political mayhem, Claire's true identity will become a deciding factor in his success, or else a catalyst for his downfall. Whichever it may be, Claire will be sure to repay her debt before she leaves!\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [Naver (R15)](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5503661), [RidiBooks (R19)](https://ridibooks.com/books/1824007812)","fr":"Les habitants de Genevu paient toujours leurs dettes. Mais Balt ne se contente pas d'une seule nuit et installe Claire et sa famille dans son palais pour qu'elle puisse le «servir» quand bon lui semble. Cependant, Claire pourrait bien finir par rembourser Balt plus qu'il ne l'aurait imaginé... car Claire n'est pas tout à fait une simple paysanne ordinaire. Khi Balt bị lôi kéo vào vòng xoáy chính trị của đế chế, thân phận thực sự của Claire chính là chìa khoá mở ra thành công của Balt, hoặc sẽ trở thành chất xúc tác đẩy anh xuống vực thẳm. As if responding to her thoughts, it chooses for her and she finds herself suddenly summoned into the world of an otome game. While Anise is dumbfounded at her situation, Hime, the girl who is summoned with her declares, \"I'm the Saintess!\" As a result, Anise is treated as useless and driven out.   \n  \nIf things were to continue to go on like this, then the general of the neighboring country will die, Hime, as the saint, will take over, and a tragic ending will be met. The main character is a bighorn sheep who transforms into a young girl with sheep horns, who is given the name Yoko. The shepherd who finds her teaches her how to live as a human, and soon he sends her off to find happiness at a school among her own kind.  \n  \nThis school is called \"Animalium,\" and it is full of young girls who were once all kinds of animals, from sheep to wolves to rabbits! Yoko and the other girls will learn and make friends, and they must always try not to get too upset or frightened. If they do, they'll turn back into animal form, returning only to human shape when they calm down!"},"links":{"al":"102042","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B074B2VSJV","ap":"dna-doesnt-tell-us","engtl":"http://www.sevenseasentertainment.com/series/dna-doesnt-tell-us/","kt":"40863","mal":"101195","mu":"127846"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}}]}

If the demonic charm from him was a scent, the room would've been flooded with a dizzying strong scent. However, Lena's eyes held no other emotion other than worry and fear. Kahil decided to use another route. His appearance was also seductive, and even though he suppressed his demonic charm, people still fell for him. Remembering that, Kahil smirked at Lena. This special treatment wasn't freely given to anyone, but... \n\n\"S-save me, please...\" Lena, who was barely holding her tears back, plead for her life over and over.\n\nIt was at that moment when his expression that would 'make even the gods swoon' faded, \"You're not normal. You’re suspicious.\"\n\n---\nDuke Carhel Luave is known as the devilish duke due to his uncontrollable magical ability to charm every single person who lays their eyes on him. But this is more of a curse than a blessing with several noble houses plotting to drive him out of power. Having no one he can genuinely like or trust, Carhel wonders if he will ever be able to feel the warmth of another human being. One day, after raiding the estate of one of his enemies, Carhel mistakenly has Lena, the house’s maid, captured in the aftermath. But when he tries to use his charming powers to give her a painless death, something unexpected happens. As he was about to be killed, he obtained a special power that lets him give absolute orders to any god using the power of the Eye of Balor.  \n  \nUsing his special power, he stops Brynhildr from killing him and Balor orders her to strip naked as a proof of his power. 4dcf41e3-9248-42ea-b36d-b8b444128bd4:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"4dcf41e3-9248-42ea-b36d-b8b444128bd4","title":{"en":"Don't Concern Yourself With That Book (Promo)"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Don't Give Your Heart to That Book"},{"ko":"그 책에 마음을 주지 마세요"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","tr","th","pl"],"relatedIdds":["5664a45a-ec3e-4ab3-8778-4707dd567c87"],"description":{"en":"Living for the sole aim of escaping!\n\n‘Light of Rusbella’ was a depressing romance novel. Wishing for a new life, Asili Rosé was reborn as the 8th wife of the Estrian Emperor. She thought she was born with a golden spoon, but it was actually just a gilded spoon? Once she realized that nothing but ruin awaited, she found a diary foreshadowing the future…\n\nIt foretold Asili’s death by the hands of the Crown Prince, Castor!\n  \n[“What does the empire mean to you?”\nAfter asking this, the Crown Prince smiled so very beautifully. And then he killed me.]\n\nUnfortunately, Asili kept coming back to life, and continued to be killed over and over again. As she continued to relive her deaths, she slowly lost her smile and changed.\n\n…Let’s try to survive first.\n\n---\n“What can I do for my elder brother?”\n\n“Well.”\n\n---\nPale sky blue hair fluttered finely in the wind. The truth that my fiancé had a hidden lover, and it was my very own male cousin.\n\nOn the second morning, after my 20th birthday, a miracle happened. From that point on, I decided not to believe in love anymore. I want to have a relationship with no strings attached and without any superficial feelings such as love.\n\n\"Duke Agentine, will you marry me?\"\n\nThis proposal was nothing more than a marriage to keep up appearances and without love involved.\n\n---\n[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=53939289)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-soulless-duchess/)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Istri-Palsu-Duke/3280)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/24657)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%A7%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%8A%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%AA/23)\n\n**Original Novel:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4386129), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/3170012735)\n\n**Official Novel Translation:** [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/72805)","fr":"Je suis morte misérablement, le jour où j’ai découvert la vérité. 4eb6239a-3845-41f7-97b3-f29195a61850:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"4eb6239a-3845-41f7-97b3-f29195a61850","title":{"en":"The Head"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Boss"},{"ko":"대가리"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["fr","en","tr"],"description":{"en":"In the lawless Arang Technical High School, Kim-gu simply hopes to lead his life as a \"good student\"…","fr":"Kim-Gu vient d’arriver au lycée Arang qui regroupe tous les plus gros cassos et voyous du pays. Il a pour objectif de devenir un élève modèle dans un lycée où le règlement intérieur n’existe plus depuis très longtemps et où seule, la loi du plus fort règne. Dans un lycée ou tout est régie par une système de badge qui représente le rang de chaque élève – plus il y a d’étoiles sur le badge et plus la personne est influente, forte ou puissante – Kim-Gu va venir jouer le trouble-fête défiant le système par la force. In the middle of her quest, a young and dashing man appeared before her. As her father’s only child, Leyrin Efran becomes a countess overnight, but to secure her family’s title and estate, legally she must be wed!\n\nShe enlists info from the infamous Nine Night Guild to find a man of lower rank to keep the empire at bay. Leylinnek, Efran grófi család egyetlen örökösének férjet kellett találnia ahhoz, hogy örökölje ősei nemesi címét. Hogy ne kelljen szenvednie a szerelem nélküli házasságtól, Leylin úgy döntött, keres egy férjet, akivel egyéves szerződést köt. Keresése közepén egy fiatal és lelkes férfival köt szerződést. Leylin meg volt győződve arról, hogy ő a megfelelő a férfi számára, de vajon tényleg ez a jó választás Leylin veszélyes helyzetére?\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://ridibooks.com/v2/Detail?id=2008012958)\n\n[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=53949651)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* English: [Radish](https://radishfiction.com/stories/17786), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/i-was-tricked-into-this-fake-marriage/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/645647)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%80%99%E6%A0%B9%E6%9C%AC%E5%B0%B1%E6%98%AF%E5%80%8B%E8%A9%90%E5%A6%BB%E9%99%B7%E9%98%B1/21)\n* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/pi%C3%A9g%C3%A9e-mariage-frauduleux)\n* [Hindi / हिन्दी](https://krosskomics.com/series/409330)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Aku-dan-Pernikahan-Palsu/3247)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/14746)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B3%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A8%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%88/22)","id":"Kerajaan Sophen hancur, luluh lantak setelah ditaklukkan kekaisaran.
